languages.text: Происходящее кажется слишком опасным, чтобы оставлять как есть, и флагман фон Валанциус бомбардирует монолиты, пока последние фрагменты не обращаются в пыль под торпедами и вспышками смертоносных орудий самих пирамид.

traits.locale_text: Происходящее кажется слишком опасным, чтобы оставлять как есть, и флагман фон Валанциус бомбардирует монолиты, пока последние фрагменты не обращаются в пыль под имперскими снарядами и последними вспышками смертоносных орудий самих пирамид.

languages.text: The phenomenon seems too dangerous to leave it as is, and the von Valancius flagship bombards the monoliths until the last fragments are turned to dust by torpedoes and flashes from the pyramids' own deadly weaponry.
languages.original_text: Происходящее кажется слишком опасным, чтобы оставлять как есть, и флагман фон Валанциус бомбардирует монолиты, пока последние фрагменты не обращаются в пыль под торпедами и вспышками смертоносных орудий самих пирамид.

traits.locale_text: The phenomenon seems too dangerous to leave it as is, and the von Valancius flagship bombards the monoliths until the last fragments are turned to dust by torpedoes and flashes from the pyramids' own deadly weaponry.

The phenomenon seems too dangerous to leave it as is, and the von Valancius flagship bombards the monoliths until the last fragments are turned to dust by torpedoes and flashes from the pyramids' own deadly weaponry.

The phenomenon seems too dangerous to leave it as is, and the von Valancius flagship bombards the monoliths until the last fragments are turned to dust by torpedoes and flashes from the pyramids' own deadly weaponry.

The phenomenon seems too dangerous to leave it as is, and the von Valancius flagship bombards the monoliths until the last fragments are turned to dust by torpedoes and flashes from the pyramids' own deadly weaponry.

The phenomenon seems too dangerous to leave it as is, and the von Valancius flagship bombards the monoliths until the last fragments are turned to dust by torpedoes and flashes from the pyramids' own deadly weaponry.

languages.text: 这些东西看起来实在是太危险了，绝不能继续留着。冯·瓦兰修斯的旗舰开始轰炸这些巨型建筑，直到最后一块碎片被鱼雷与金字塔射出来的致命光束化为灰烬。
languages.original_text: The phenomenon seems too dangerous to leave it as is, and the von Valancius flagship bombards the monoliths until the last fragments are turned to dust by torpedoes and flashes from the pyramids' own deadly weaponry.

traits.locale_text: 这些东西看起来实在是太危险了，绝不能继续留着。冯·瓦兰修斯的旗舰开始轰炸这些巨型建筑，直到最后一块碎片被鱼雷与金字塔射出来的致命光束化为灰烬。

languages.text: この現象は放置するには危険すぎる。フォン・ヴァランシウスの旗艦はモノリスを砲撃し、それは最後の破片が魚雷とピラミッドの強力な兵器からの閃光によって塵に変わるまで続いた。
languages.original_text: The phenomenon seems too dangerous to leave it as is, and the von Valancius flagship bombards the monoliths until the last fragments are turned to dust by torpedoes and flashes from the pyramids' own deadly weaponry.

traits.locale_text: この現象は放置するには危険すぎる。フォン・ヴァランシウスの旗艦はモノリスを砲撃し、それは最後の破片が魚雷とピラミッドの強力な兵器からの閃光によって塵に変わるまで続いた。

languages.text: El fenómeno parecía demasiado peligroso para dejarlo estar, y la nave insignia von Valancius bombardea los monolitos hasta que los torpedos y los haces de las propias pirámides reducen a polvo los restos.
languages.original_text: The phenomenon seems too dangerous to leave it as is, and the von Valancius flagship bombards the monoliths until the last fragments are turned to dust by torpedoes and flashes from the pyramids' own deadly weaponry.

traits.locale_text: El fenómeno parecía demasiado peligroso para dejarlo estar, y la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} von Valancius bombardea los monolitos hasta que los torpedos y los haces de las propias pirámides reducen a polvo los restos.

languages.text: Das Phänomen wirkt zu gefährlich, um es einfach so zu belassen. Das Valancius-Flaggschiff bombardiert die Monolithen, bis auch die letzten Fragmente von Torpedos und Blitzen aus den eigenen tödlichen Waffen der Pyramiden pulverisiert sind.
languages.original_text: The phenomenon seems too dangerous to leave it as is, and the von Valancius flagship bombards the monoliths until the last fragments are turned to dust by torpedoes and flashes from the pyramids' own deadly weaponry.

traits.locale_text: Das Phänomen wirkt zu gefährlich, um es einfach so zu belassen. Das Valancius-Flaggschiff bombardiert die Monolithen, bis auch die letzten Fragmente von Torpedos und Blitzen aus den eigenen tödlichen Waffen der Pyramiden pulverisiert sind.

languages.text: Ce phénomène a l'air dangereux, trop pour qu'on le laisse sévir. Le vaisseau amiral des von Valancius bombarde les monolithes jusqu'à ce que leurs derniers fragments soient réduits en poussière par les torpilles et les radiations émises par leur propre arsenal meurtrier.
languages.original_text: The phenomenon seems too dangerous to leave it as is, and the von Valancius flagship bombards the monoliths until the last fragments are turned to dust by torpedoes and flashes from the pyramids' own deadly weaponry.

traits.locale_text: Ce phénomène a l'air dangereux, trop pour qu'on le laisse sévir. Le vaisseau amiral des von Valancius bombarde les monolithes jusqu'à ce que leurs derniers fragments soient réduits en poussière par les torpilles et les radiations émises par leur propre arsenal meurtrier.

languages.text: Bu fenomen, sağlam bırakılamayacak kadar tehlikeli görünüyor. Von Valancius sancak gemisi, son parçaları da torpidolarla ve piramidin kendi ölümcül cephaneliğinin saçtığı ışınlarla paramparça olana dek monoliti bombalıyor.
languages.original_text: The phenomenon seems too dangerous to leave it as is, and the von Valancius flagship bombards the monoliths until the last fragments are turned to dust by torpedoes and flashes from the pyramids' own deadly weaponry.
